data.title: Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures Release Schedule
data.meta_description: Your daily source for everything Star Tours and more!
data.text:
The Walt Disney Company released today an updated slate of films going all the way to 2027, which includes several titles from FOX. What’s really notable is to have an actual release date for the 5th Indiana Jones movie in 2021, as well as a look at when to expect another Marvel (only two titles next year) or Star Wars film. Below is a look at that schedule.

2019

5/10/19 – TOLKIEN (Fox Searchlight)

5/24/19 – ALADDIN (Disney)

6/7/19 – DARK PHOENIX (Fox)

6/21/19 – TOY STORY 4 (Disney)

7/12/19 – STUBER (Fox)

7/19/19 – THE LION KING (Disney)

8/9/19 – THE ART OF RACING IN THE RAIN (Fox)

9/20/19 – AD ASTRA (Fox)

10/4/19 – THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW (Fox)

10/18/19 – MALEFICENT: MISTRESS OF EVIL (Disney)

11/15/19 – FORD v. FERRARI (Fox)

11/22/19 – FROZEN 2 (Disney)

12/20/19 – STAR WARS: THE RISE OF SKYWALKER (Disney)

12/25/19 – SPIES IN DISGUISE (Fox)

2020

1/10/20 – UNDERWATER (Fox)

2/14/20 – UNTITLED KINGSMAN MOVIE (Fox)

2/21/20 – CALL OF THE WILD (Fox)

3/6/20 – ONWARD (Disney)

3/27/20 – MULAN (Disney)

4/3/20 – THE NEW MUTANTS (Fox)

5/1/20 – UNTITLED MARVEL (Disney)

5/29/20 – ARTEMIS FOWL (Disney)

6/19/20 – UNTITLED PIXAR ANIMATION (Disney)

7/3/20 – FREE GUY (Fox)

7/17/20 – BOB’S BURGERS (Fox)

7/24/20 – JUNGLE CRUISE (Disney)

8/14/20 – THE ONE AND ONLY IVAN (Disney)

10/9/20 – DEATH ON THE NILE (Fox)

11/6/20 – UNTITLED MARVEL (Disney)

11/6/20 – RON’S GONE WRONG (Fox)

11/25/20 – UNTITLED DISNEY ANIMATION (Disney)

12/18/20 – WEST SIDE STORY (Fox)

12/23/20 – CRUELLA (Disney)

2021

2/12/21 – UNTITLED MARVEL (Disney)

3/5/21 – NIMONA (Fox)

3/12/21 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

5/7/21 – UNTITLED MARVEL (Disney)

5/28/21 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

6/18/21 – UNTITLED PIXAR ANIMATION (Disney)

7/9/21 – UNTITLED INDIANA JONES (Disney)

7/30/21 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

10/8/21 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

11/5/21 – UNTITLED MARVEL (Disney)

3/18/22 – UNTITLED PIXAR (Disney)

5/6/22 – UNTITLED MARVEL (Disney)

5/27/22 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

6/17/22 – UNTITLED PIXAR (Disney)

7/8/22 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

7/29/22 – UNTITLED MARVEL (Disney)

10/7/22 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

11/4/22 – UNTITLED DISNEY LIVE ACTION (Disney)

11/23/22 – UNTITLED DISNEY ANIMATION (Disney)
